🐛 **Bug Report**
📝 Description
When pigs come in contact with mud, they duplicate into muddy pigs

⭐ Describe the solution you'd like
Make them not duplicate

🥟 How to reproduce?
Put a pig into mud

🔢 Which version of the mod are you using?
1.0.0.0
